apprentice general: You wonder if there are any Rot Wound leaders who would be willing to give you your warrior name.
As each cycle goes by, you grow increasingly bored at the vase world of black rot.
You train vigorously, refusing to lose the skills you fought so hard for.
You watch as the Rot Wound warriors train from the sidelines, wishing that they'd allow you to join.
You're too small for fights but you're too big for resting.
apprentice introspective: You're not interested in training, unlike the other apprentices. Instead, you sit by your lonesome, wondering what you did to deserve being sent to this rotten waste land.
You try to climb the trees to see overhead, wondering if there is more than black trees and mystery, but your paws are unable to sink into the wood like you hoped.
apprentice rare: You allow yourself to entertain the thought of The Ascended forgiving and pulling you from the Rot Wound, even though you know it'll never happen.
